front.title: Experience with Testing of Mapping of Address and Port Using Translation (MAP-T)

abstract.t: This document describes the testing result of a network utilizing a Mapping of Address and Port using Translation (MAP-T) double translation solution; it provides an overview of user applications' behavior with a shared IPv4 address. The MAP-T software is from CERNET Center and the test environment is on the NIC.br network with real and virtualized machines.
